Nature Stories

On one splendid evening, when the weather was very pleasant,
a boy was playing in the garden. He was running left and right after some beautiful butterflies.
He looked around and saw colorful flowers of all shapes and sizes. He then saw a shiny green frog hopping around,
he ran after it and reached near a small pond.
